abstract: Accesses the transaction value associated with a custom key.

declaration.code: subscript<K>(key: K.Type) -> K.Value where K : TransactionKey { get set }

overview:
## Overview

Create custom transaction values by defining a key that conforms to the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/TransactionKey] protocol, and then using that key with the subscript operator of the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Transaction] structure to get and set a value for that key:

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the transaction originated from an action that produces a sequence of values.
items.name: isContinuous

items.description: The preferred alignment of the view within a scroll view’s visible region when scrolling to a view.
items.name: scrollTargetAnchor

items.description: Whether this transaction will track the velocity of any animatable properties that change.
items.name: tracksVelocity

title: subscript(_:)
